## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [overrideRootDir?](./inline-fixture-files.forkoptions.overriderootdir.md) |  | string \| undefined | _(Optional)_ The path to the root directory of the fixture.
